overview:
Covert & Co. is a next-generation investment bank providing premium M&A and financing services to Internet, media and technology companies. We bring 20 years of experience with over 100 transactions totaling more than $5 billion.

M&A Transactions include: SRS Labs - DTS, NewsCorp/IGN - Hearst/UGO, Aeria Games/Gamepot, Club Penguin - Disney, MySpace - NewsCorp, Musicmatch - Yahoo, DailyCandy - Comcast, Neven Vision- Google, Grouper(Crackle) - Sony, Lexico - IAC, ifilm - Viacom, Rent.com- Ebay, SocialShield - Avira, Mobile Messenger - Silverlake, WRQSoftware - Francisco Partners, CoCreate Software- HBK, SignStorey - CBS, GERS (Escalate) Software - Golden Gate Capital, Pilot Software - SAP, Element5- DigitalRiver, IQNavigator - GTCR, eLabor - ADP, Schematic - WPP, Marc Global - Red Prairie, Talisma - nGenera, MetaReward - Experian, LogicLibrary - SOASoftware, SearchRev - AKQA, UGO - Hearst, SRD - IBM, SyncCast - Thomson, Unicru - Kronos, Trymedia - Macrovision, Jobs.com - Monster.com, Peace Software - First Data, Cast & Crew - Abry Partners, XDrive - AOL, Autobase - Dominion, 1GlobalPlace - Verisign, Dairyland Healthcare - Francisco Partners, Consumer Info - Experian, GoApply - Fidelity, IT Toolbox - CEB, Procuri - Ariba, ZMD - Simtek, AdvancedMD - Francisco Partners, XtreamLok - Symantec, PayerPath - Misys, Quote.com - InteractiveData, RelayHealth - McKesson, Eteamz - Active.com, SocialShield - Avira, Fastpoint Games - WePlay
